column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered pepperoni with bunch of veggies as toppings
column2: but when our pizza came to our table
column3: it only had pepperoni and olives as toppings. We informed the waiter and he first asked if we wanted to wait for our correct order
column4: which will take another 30min. We already had waited over 30min to be seated
column5: so we said we would rather not and we just ate the pizza with just pepperoni and olives. We usually like our pizzas with lots of toppings
column6: so we didn't enjoy it as much
column7: but it was good! Later on
column8: the manager came to our table and apologized for the mistake. He gave us a 50% discount. Although we were a bit disappointed about the wrong order
column9: we were satisfied by the service.
